caption.p: Emulsion Stability Index (ESI) of emulsions before spray drying A and after reconstitution B. FOCE-MS-10%—FOCE-based emulsion with 10% of flaxseed oil; FOCE-MS-20%—FOCE-based emulsion with 20% of flaxseed oil; MS-10%—emulsion without FOCE with 10% of flaxseed oil; MS-20%—emulsion without FOCE with 20% of flaxseed oil. Means with different lowercase are significantly different at p < 0.05.
